alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 4:27PM CDT until June 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...NORTHEASTERN SARPY AND EASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southern Omaha, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 424 PM, quarter sized hail and 60 mph winds were reported 1 mile north of Papillion. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Carter Lake around 430 PM CDT. Benson and Eppley Airfield around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Florence and Omaha. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
